titles.title: I Know Not Why God's Saving Grace

properties.copyright: 1999 Thankyou Music, Administered by EMI Christian Music Publishing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I know not why God's wondrous grace
To me He hath made known
Nor why unworthy as I am
He claimed me for His own

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
But I know whom I've believed
He's able now to save
What I've committed unto Him
Until that final day

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I know not how this saving faith
To me He did impart
Nor how believing in His word
Wrought peace within my heart

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I know not how the Spirit moves
Convincing men of sin
Revealing Jesus through the Word
Creating faith in Him

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I know not what of good or ill
May be reserved for me
Of weary ways or golden days
Before His face I see

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I know not when my Lord may come
I know not when or where
If I shall pass the vale of death
Or meet Him in the air
